name: HyperDX
headline: Open-source, dev-friendly observability.
description:
HyperDX assists engineers in resolving production bugs more quickly with simple workflows that take you from alert to resolution. You can get set up in a matter of minutes and correlate debug telemetry all in one place, including logs, metrics, traces, and browser session replays, allowing you to resolve issues faster than ever before.

HyperDX is open source and built on top of Clickhouse and S3, so customers can enjoy ten times the savings when compared to traditional vendors like Datadog.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:open-source; industry:infrastructure; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Michael Shi, Founder
founders.description: Michael was the PM leading developer experience at LogDNA (YC W15) scaling through $Xm to $XXm ARR growth.

founders.name: Warren Lee, Founder
founders.description: Previously built a profitable company from 0 to millions ARR

# Resolve Production Issues, Fast.
## An Open Source Observability Platform: Unify Session Replays, Logs, Traces, Metrics and Errors – All Without the Datadog Price Tag
[Get Started for Free](https://hyperdx.io/</register>)[Play in Live Sandbox](https://hyperdx.io/<https:/api.hyperdx.io/login/demo>)
1
Playback Client Session
2
Correlate Server Traces
3
Search All Traces & Logs
Trusted by high-velocity engineering teams
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%273690%27%20height=%27108%27/%3e)![Customer logos](https://hyperdx.io/)
Backed by
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27572%27%20height=%27172%27/%3e)![Y Combinator](https://hyperdx.io/)
## Correlate End to End
Trace every request from a user's browser and phone to your backend servers and async workers, automatically.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%271926%27%20height=%271746%27/%3e)![Correlate logs and spans all in one trace view](https://hyperdx.io/)
## Correlate End to End
Trace every request from a user's browser and phone to your backend servers and async workers, automatically.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%271926%27%20height=%271746%27/%3e)![Correlate logs and spans all in one trace view](https://hyperdx.io/)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27250%27%20height=%27250%27/%3e)![Green Lightning Bolt](https://hyperdx.io/)
Blazing Fast Performance
Search terabytes of events in seconds. Powered by Clickhouse.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%271216%27%20height=%27274%27/%3e)![Log and Trace Search Syntax](https://hyperdx.io/)
Intuitive Search Syntax
Instantly find logs and spans with simple full text search. No complex syntax needed.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%271122%27%20height=%27462%27/%3e)![Automatically clustered event patterns](https://hyperdx.io/)
Automatically Clustered Event Patterns
Seamlessly aggregate log patterns and condense billions of events into distinctive clusters.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%271485%27%20height=%27708%27/%3e)![Automatically correlated session replay with logs and traces](https://hyperdx.io/)
Correlated Session Replays
Automatically link session replays with backend logs and traces.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%271926%27%20height=%271620%27/%3e)![Graph and share all your logs, metrics and traces with our intuitive chart builder](https://hyperdx.io/)
## Visualize in Detail
Graph and share all your logs, metrics and traces with our intuitive chart builder. For example, chart the number of errors grouped by customer ID in just a few clicks.
## Visualize in Detail
Graph and share all your logs, metrics and traces with our intuitive chart builder. For example, chart the number of errors grouped by customer ID in just a few clicks.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%271926%27%20height=%271620%27/%3e)![Graph and share all your logs, metrics and traces with our intuitive chart builder](https://hyperdx.io/)
### Fight Incidents, Not Your Observability Bill
$0.40 per GB
$0 per User
$0 per Host
Low prices made possible with Clickhouse backed by Object Storage
[View Pricing](https://hyperdx.io/</pricing>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%271398%27%20height=%27492%27/%3e)![HyperDX is 10x cheaper than Datadog and 3x cheaper than New Relic](https://hyperdx.io/)
Pricing example is for 10 TB of logs and traces per month saved for 30 days across 45 hosts with 35 seats.
## Instrument Automatically
Trace every log, API request, DB query, and more with just a few lines of code. Instrument your stack in minutes.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%274530%27%20height=%27218%27/%3e)![HyperDX Integrations](https://hyperdx.io/)
[View Documentation for More](https://hyperdx.io/</docs>)
Alerts. Get notified on Slack, Email or PagerDuty when things go wrong.
Intercom Integration. Jump directly from Intercom into the user's session, logs and traces.
Live Tail. View and search your log streams in real-time.
Native JSON Parsing. Search and graph structured JSON logs, with no additional configuration.
Vendor Agnostic Instrumentation. Powered by OpenTelemetry, instrument once without fear of vendor lock-in.
Agent-Free Install. No additional agents, sidecars or containers to manage if you don't want to.
[Get Started for Free](https://hyperdx.io/</register>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27140%27%20height=%27140%27/%3e)![Github Logo](https://hyperdx.io/)

generated_description:
### HyperDX: Observability Done Right

**Overview**  
Founded in 2022 and hailing from the prestigious Y Combinator Batch S22, HyperDX is spearheading a new era in engineering with its mission of delivering open-source, developer-friendly observability tools. Located in San Mateo, California, the company is small but mighty, consisting of a dedicated team of four.

**What They Do**  
HyperDX started by addressing a crucial pain point for engineers: resolving production bugs swiftly. It accomplishes this by offering a streamlined workflow that aggregates alerts and debugging telemetry in one place—logs, metrics, traces, and even browser session replays. Setting it up? You're looking at just minutes before you start resolving issues faster than ever. 

One of the standout features is the ability to correlate every request from a user’s browser all the way through to backend servers and async workers, automating the tracing process. This is particularly useful for high-velocity engineering teams who need to act immediately to resolve issues without getting bogged down by cumbersome tooling.

**Cost Efficiency**   
HyperDX is not just about speed; it’s also refreshingly cost-effective. By leveraging Clickhouse and S3, they offer significant savings—up to ten times cheaper than traditional monitoring solutions like Datadog. Pricing is straightforward, charging $0.40 per GB without costs per user or host, enabling teams to focus on building rather than worrying about the observability bill.

**Open Source Philosophy**  
The company embodies the spirit of open-source. They provide a platform that not only promotes transparency but also encourages collaboration within the community. With tools designed to be vendor-agnostic and an easy setup with minimal friction, HyperDX empowers developers to instrument their applications seamlessly, avoiding vendor lock-in.

**Features & Integrations**  
HyperDX includes a range of powerful features like:
- **Log Patterns**: Instantly cluster and analyze similar logs.
- **Correlated Session Replays**: Link session replays directly with backend logs.
- **Intuitive Search Tools**: Easy-to-use search functionality without convoluted syntax.
- **Visualization Tools**: An advanced chart builder for detailed insights.

Moreover, it integrates effortlessly with existing tools. Want Slack alerts when something goes wrong? Done. Need to jump from Intercom straight to a user’s session? No problem.

**The Future**  
As they continue to refine their offerings and expand their community, HyperDX is poised to be a game changer in the observability space. Their blend of speed, simplicity, and savings is a refreshing take that can easily disrupt the traditional players who have dominated the market for too long.

Check them out at [HyperDX](https://hyperdx.io/) for a glimpse of how observability should be.
